TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_yadah, title = yadah, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/yadah} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam: ) yadah ku tademaw tayni miazih tu lalikid. . caay ka yadah ku asu'ay a lami' i luma'. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
